Heroes_Villains.States

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • Heroes_Villains.States.State
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminState, BattleState, ControlsState, EndState, GameState, MenuState, PauseState, SetupState, TeamBuilderState

    public abstract class State
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract parent class for all states of the game used to define required methods for children

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Game game 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      State(Game game)
      Contructer for state, makes a new state

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void render(java.awt.Graphics graphics)
      Abstract render method, this method gets defined properly in the children of state and gets ran 60 times per second.
      abstract void update()
      Abstract update method, this method gets defined properly in the children of state and gets ran 60 times per second.

    • Field Detail

      • game

        protected Game game

    • Constructor Detail

      • State

        public State(Game game)
        Contructer for state, makes a new state
        Parameters:
        game - game object, standard pass-through

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public abstract void update()
        Abstract update method, this method gets defined properly in the children of state and gets ran 60 times per second. This method is used to provide the functionality to the states of the game.

      • render

        public abstract void render(java.awt.Graphics graphics)
        Abstract render method, this method gets defined properly in the children of state and gets ran 60 times per second. This method is used to create the look of the states of the game.
        Parameters:
        graphics - Graphics object, required to be able to use render methods of objects defined in the current state
